current.heading: Our Team
current.paragraph: We're a growing body of talented individuals with a passion for making game development exciting in every way. Hover over each profile!

officers.title: President
officers.name: Aslan Chan
officers.quote: Hii! I'm Aslan, 3rd year CS major. I'm the President and I'm hoping to organize some really cool events for you guys this year. In terms of game dev, I mainly enjoy programming and maybe a little game design. If I'm not game dev-ing, you'll catch me playing some volleyball, going to the gym, and playing Tetris. If you guys ever have any feedback on events, feel free to come up to me and let me know!

officers.title: Vice President
officers.name: Breanna Lau
officers.quote: Hey y'all, it's Breanna, a 3rd year studying ICAM visual arts and minoring in film production! I'm a Christian interested in pursuing cinematography and compositing, perchance in games, though I love all forms of entertainment media. I enjoy drawing, singing, hiking, and ofc gaming. Hmu on Discord @breagle and follow my art acc @breagle.art on Insta to see my work <3

officers.title: Treasurer & Events Director
officers.name: Andrew Khov
officers.quote: Yo! Iâ€™m Andrew and I am a 4th year Math-CS student. I'll be duel-wielding roles this final year! I play a lot of different games, especially roguelikes and strategy games so hit me up if you wanna chill. Welcome to our club, I hope you know we really appreciate and encourage you to come to as many of our events as possible! And hopefully we'll be able to break into the industry or just make some fire games!

officers.title: Marketing Director
officers.name: Olivia Tsui
officers.quote: Hello! I'm Olivia, a fourth-year ICAM Visual Arts major and the Marketing Director for VGDC. I'm interested in the visual and storytelling components of games -- my favorite games include A Short Hike and Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney!

officers.title: Projects Director
officers.name: Ethan Schwartzman
officers.quote: Hi! I'm Ethan, a 3rd-year CS major with a minor in ICAM music. I enjoy programming, game design, and composing original music for VGDC!

officers.title: Tech Director
officers.name: Ethan Carter
officers.quote: Hi, I'm Ethan! I'm a 3rd-year Math CS major and Physics minor, and I'm your tech director. In terms of game development, I like programming, game design, and making music. Some of my favorite games are the Witcher 3, Outer Wilds, Cyberpunk 2077, and Terraria.

officers.title: Marketing Officer
officers.name: Allie Atkinson
officers.quote: I'm a 3rd year Mathematics-Computer Science major! I love taking care of my cat, going to the beach, and listening to music. My favorite games are Hollow Knight and Stardew Valley. On the game development side, I create my own assets for 2D or topdown 2D games. I love puzzles and new challenges!

officers.title: Marketing Officer
officers.name: Cass Adefuin
officers.quote: HILLO I'm Cass, a 3rd year Computer Science major and Cognitive Science minor! I love trying various art forms - graphics, 3D modeling, music composition, whatever tickles my creativity. Some of my favorite games are NieR: Automata, Hollow Knight, and the To the Moon series. Reach out to me on Discord @fe.nyx :D

officers.title: Marketing Officer
officers.name: Madison DeLuca
officers.quote: Hi, you can call me Mads! I'm a transfer ICAM VIS Arts major with a focus in design & 3D models :) I love cake decorating, film/digital photography, art books, and of course video games (esp rpgs)! You can find me on @mads.r.d on ig <3

officers.title: Marketing Officer
officers.name: Zee Avila
officers.quote: Hi! My name is Zee, I'm a third year majoring in ICAM and I'm a new Marketing officer with a focus on design.

officers.title: Events Officer
officers.name: Elijah Garcia
officers.quote: Hi, I'm Elijah! I'm a third year nano engineering major and I love rock climbing and music. I play the guitar and button accordion and I'm learning to sing so if you ever want to jam let me know!

officers.title: Events Officer
officers.name: Mina Hu
officers.quote: Hi, I'm Mina! I've been hooked on game dev for a cool decade now, and I'm looking to break into the industry through production or concept art, with an interest in localization. I'm a 3rd year ICAM major, and I like roguelikes a lot.

officers.title: Events Officer
officers.name: Sofia Nguyen
officers.quote: Heyo! My name is Sofia, I'm a Computer Science major with a minor in ICAM. I love puzzles, manga, and reading. I am trying to learn game development and piano in my free time.

officers.title: Events Officer
officers.name: Xavier Chua
officers.quote: Hi! Iâ€™m Xavier, a 3rd year CS major. I enjoy outside walks, sports, and gaming. I play jrpg games in my free time and Iâ€™ve been taking an interest at learning more about graphics programming!

officers.title: PR Officer
officers.name: Joshua Nolasco
officers.quote: Hey ya! I'm Josh, a 3rd-year Business Economics major and the PR Officer for VGDC. I love games, films, art, animation, and hitting the gym. Hit me up at @jashnola on discord!

officers.title: Tech Officer
officers.name: Jacky Mei
officers.quote: Hi, I'm Jacky, a 4th year Computer Engineering major and Physics minor. I'm a new tech officer responsible for maintaining the VGDC arcade cabinet, and I've also done a fair bit of game programming and design in the club. I like reading sci-fi, strategy games, and playing and modding Celeste.

officers.title: Tech Officer
officers.name: Timothy Washburn
officers.quote: Hi I'm Timothy, a second year CS major at Seventh! I'm writing this comment retroactively so there's no point in really saying much here as this year already ended, but I figured I was updating the website anyway so I may as well put something here.

officers.title: Art Lead
officers.name: Jolina Leong
officers.quote: Hello! I'm Jolina, a fourth year majoring in ICAM Vis Arts with a minor in Studio Arts. Some games I really enjoy include Hades, BOTW, Persona 5 and NieR: Automata. In my spare time, I like to draw, read and learn new languages.

officers.title: Art Lead
officers.name: Tamika Hsieh
officers.quote: Hi, I'm Tamika and I'm a second year ICAM and Cog Sci Design major! Some of my interests outside of school and VGDC are reading, drawing, playing games (stardew, spiritfarer, acnh, mc), and watching TV shows (talk to me abt anime, fantasy, and sci-fi)! I'm interested in going into the game industry as an artist/producer!

officers.title: Audio Lead
officers.name: River Hsu
officers.quote: Hello! I am a third year double majoring in ICAM-Music and Math-CS. I enjoy producing music, singing and playing games. I love games like Dark Souls 3, Elden Ring, Sekiro, Hollow Knight, Overwatch, Etc.

officers.title: Producer
officers.name: Isabel Hsieh
officers.quote: Hello hello!! I'm Isabel, a 4th year ICAM vis arts major and your projects producer for this year!! I adore games with impactful stories, and some favorites are Limbus Company, Guilty Gear, and Fire Emblem! Outside of gaming I love music, fashion, and anything pink and cute!! For game dev, I dabble in a little bit of everything, so if you see me running around feel free to say hi!! ðŸŒ±ðŸ©·

officers.title: Programming Lead
officers.name: Jonathan Renteria
officers.quote: Heyo, I'm Jonathan, a 3rd year CE major. I love playing a variety of games from movement shooters and immersive sims to CRPGs and grand strategy. This year, I'm excited to help work on and organize VGDC's many game development projects and workshops!

officers.title: Programming Lead
officers.name: Nathan Scott
officers.quote: Hello! I'm Nathan, and I'm a second year CS major. I enjoy programming and game design, and I'm hoping to go into the industry after I graduate. I love playing roguelikes and souls-likes, and some of my favorite games are Hades, Black Myth: Wukong, and Jedi: Fallen Order. I'm looking forward to helping lead this year's game jams and projects!

officers.title: UI/UX Lead
officers.name: Carol Chen
officers.quote: Hi! I'm Carol, fourth year cognitive science - design specialization major and marketing minor, joining VGDC this year to work on UI/UX! I'm a huge fan of matcha, collecting blind boxes, and games like val/league/hsr/hades, so feel free to reach out on Discord @rouuuu :D

officers.title: UI/UX Lead
officers.name: Valerie Djatikusuma
officers.quote: Hello! My name is Valerie, and I'm a Cognitive Science transfer specializing in Design & Interaction. I'm super excited to be joining VGDC to lead UI/UX this year. Some of my favorite games are Hades, Rhythm Heaven, Persona 5, and Professor Layton. Besides playing games I love to draw and watch 3 hour+ video essays (usually also about video games).

officers.title: Writing Lead
officers.name: Jessica Yang
officers.quote: Hey y'all! My name is Jess, and I'm a second year ESYS Environmental Policy major! When I'm not writing my silly little stories, I like sewing, drawing, playing games, listening to music, and admiring various amphibious critters. You can find me on instagram @faernis if you want to see what shenanigans I'm up to!

officers.title: Tech Officer
officers.name: Luna Zhu
officers.quote: Hellooo, this is Luna! I'm a third-year Computer Science student who also loves doing visual art! Because of that, I value both the artistic aspect and the gameplay experience in game design. My favorite games are Hylics 1 & 2, rhythm games (Arcaea, Project Sekai, Phigros, etc.), Animal Crossing (300+ hours), and most of the grinding games!

2024-2025.heading: 2024-2025 Officers
2024-2025.paragraph: The 2024 - 2025 school year was a large period of growth for VGDC; with an event attendance increase of 300% from the previous academic year, the club expanded its officer team. Host to several game development projects, the year culminated in the club coming together to work on Mariposa, the 2024 iteration of The Chanel Project. Come spring, the reins of president were handed to Aslan Chan, alongside a newly elected executive board.

officers.title: President
officers.name: Kiichiro Wang
officers.quote: HIYA!! I'm Kiichi, a 3rd year ICAM Major and CS minor and the president for the upcoming 2024-2025 year. I love dabbling in a little bit of everything like digital art, game programming, game production, drums, and archery. I'm super stoked to be working on some future events and projects so I hope I see y'all then :D

officers.title: Vice President
officers.name: Breanna Lau
officers.quote: Hey y'all, it's Breanna, a 3rd year studying ICAM visual arts and minoring in film production! I'm a Christian interested in pursuing cinematography and compositing, perchance in games, though I love all forms of entertainment media. I enjoy drawing, singing, hiking, and ofc gaming. Hmu on Discord @breagle and follow my art acc @breagle.art on Insta to see my work <3

officers.title: Tech Director & Treasurer
officers.name: Chase Peterson
officers.quote: Hey everyone! I'm Chase, a CS + Music major, and I lead the tech team that built the page you're looking at. I play all sorts of games, but a lot of my favorites are Nintendo and indie games. If you wanna talk or hang out definitely feel free to reach out, my Discord is @cepeters and I'm always down to meet new people :)

As an academic victim, VGDC is my hope for getting employed so don't be afraid to reach out to me if you wanna get involved or wanna chat in any way :DDD We're all going to make it <3

2023-2024.heading: 2023-2024 Officers
2023-2024.paragraph: VGDC grew dramatically in the 2023-2024 year, with a new team led by Tyler Roache. Events, led by Carey Yoon, more than tripled in attendance, and the whole club came together to build Athenaeum as part of The Chanel Project, led by Chanel Lim. In the Spring, Kiichiro Wang took over as President and more than doubled the size of the board in preparation for the next year.

officers.title: President
officers.name: Tyler Roache
officers.quote: Heyo! My name is Tyler Roache, and I was the President for the 2023-2024 year. I have a Math-CS degree, and am currenting trying to get a job in the game industry! I like making games, talking about them, and going outside to climb and explore (exposure therapy for the grass allergy). If you have any questions feel free to ask away!

officers.title: Vice President & Events Director
officers.name: Carey Yoon
officers.quote: Hey y'all! I'm Carey, Pre-Med Clinical Psychiatry major and '23 - '24 Events Coordinator / '24 Co-VP with Jewelle Tatad! In my free time, I like making JRPGs, DMing D&D campaigns, and practicing the electric guitar and piano. Reach out to me on @.twerp. on Discord for anything!

officers.title: Vice President
officers.name: Breanna Lau
officers.quote: Hey y'all, Breanna here! I'm a 2nd-year majoring in ICAM (art focus) hoping to break into character design, cinematography, worldbuilding, and narrative in games! I love drawing, singing, staying fit in interesting ways, anime, and ofc gaming. Hmu on Discord @breagle and follow my art acc @breagle.art on Insta to see my work <3

officers.name: Chanel Lim

officers.name: Chris Kreins
officers.quote: Hi! My name is Chris and im a 3rd year studying Business Psychology with a minor in Computational Social Science. I'm a big fan of Stardew Valley and Destiny 2 and I often spend my time either gaming or serving our awesome UCSD community :). If you catch me around our gaming space or even where I work at Eleanor Roosevelt College, feel free to say hi!

officers.title: Treasurer
officers.name: Chase Peterson
officers.quote: Hey! I'm Chase, a Computer Science and Music double major. I built this site with William Kim, including the page you're looking at right now! If you wanna talk or hang out definitely feel free to reach out, my Discord is @cepeters and I'm always down to meet new people :)

officers.title: Website Director
officers.name: William Kim
officers.quote: Hi everyone. I'm William and I helped rebuild VGDC's website. While my role has certainly over-extended my stay at UCSD, I had a deep commitment to finish what I started. I'm excited to see where the club goes in the next few years. Feel free to reach out to me on Discord @williamkim if you want to chat.

officers.title: 3D Art Director
officers.name: Rodolfo Marquez-Valencia
officers.quote: Hello! I'm Rodolfo! I am now an alumnus of UCSD and my major was Speculative Design. My role in the club was 3D Art Director and this role encompassed hosting workshops regarding 3D modeling and/or art to further help game developers of any experience level. As of August 2024, I am currently in an internship with the San Diego Supercomputer Center. I cannot disclose specifics with what I am doing but what I can say is that we are developing something amazing for students and educators alike using game development.
